questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?

This arc features Luffy's journey to a prison mine where he encounters a key character from his past. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?

This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
